      java.lang.String assignTurn​(java.lang.String id, java.lang.String typeId)
      Name: assignTurn.
      This method creates a turn and give it to a user, if the user does not exist or already have a turn, then throws an exception.
      pre: ArrayList users must be initialized.
      pos: created a turn and gave it to a user and move the user until the first position without turn from left to right.

      • addNewUser

        public void addNewUser​(java.lang.String typeId,
                       java.lang.String id,
                       java.lang.String firstNames,
                       java.lang.String lastNames,
                       java.lang.String adress,
                       java.lang.String telephone)
                throws UserAlreadyExistException
        Name: addNewUser.
        This method adds a new user, if the user already exist then return an exception.
        pre: ArrayList users must be initialized.
        pos: the user has been created and added or it throw an exception.
        Parameters:
        typeId - the type of the ID.
        id - the number of the ID.
        firstNames - the first names of the user.
        lastNames - the last names of the user.
        adress - the address of the user (it can be blanked).
        telephone - the telephone of the user (it can be blanked).
        Throws:
        UserAlreadyExistException
        UserAlreadyExistException

      • assignTurn

        public java.lang.String assignTurn​(java.lang.String id,
                                   java.lang.String typeId)
                            throws UserNotFoundException,
                                   UserAlreadyHasATurnException
        Name: assignTurn.
        This method creates a turn and give it to a user, if the user does not exist or already have a turn, then throws an exception.
        pre: ArrayList users must be initialized.
        pos: created a turn and gave it to a user and move the user until the first position without turn from left to right.
        Parameters:
        typeId - the type of the ID.
        id - the number of the ID.
        Returns:
        returns the number of the turn or.
        Throws:
        UserNotFoundException
        UserAlreadyHasATurnException
